column5: Persistence paid off with my second trip on the grand saturday.  Had my son with me and after he kept saying to move spots I finally did and was rewarded with my first big cat and off our last bait, his first as well.  He also got his first sucker at a respectable 18", 2 garbage gobies, and 8 small cats off worms.  Final score 12-1.
Well done bro.  That was 3 PB for both of you that day.  Matts the good luck charm and I'm nothing but bad luck lol.  Great pics
If I lived in one of those apt. I would have rod holders installed . LOL  Great catch fellas.
Nice catch, great day to be out I bet
that is an awesome shot of your boy!!! not too shabby of a cat either!  good stuff man.
